name: com.microsoft.mrtk.graphicstools.unity
description: Graphics tools and components for developing Mixed Reality applications in Unity.
author: Microsoft

samples.description: A handful of material samples demonstrating effects that can be created with the Graphics Tools/Standard shader.
Examples of components and shaders than can be used with UnityUI canvases.
Samples of different mesh outlining techniques that don't use post processing.
Samples of different mesh instancing techniques that use the MeshInstancer.
Examples of how the acrylic effect can be utilized to give materials a translucent/frosted glass look.
Demonstrates how to add a procedural drop shadow on a canvas.
Demonstrates magnification in a stereoscopic rendering setup.
